items.sentence: Why do you think Tom wasn\'t able to pass his driving test?
Why don\'t we fire everyone and hire a group of new people?
Tom said he didn\'t have enough time to make his own lunch.
Tom shouldn\'t tell Mary anything about his ex-girlfriends.
I want the whole world to know we\'re going to get married.
Tom is still the same weight he was when he was a teenager.
Tom is the kind of guy that a girl could fall in love with.
Tom told me Mary wouldn\'t want to play volleyball with us.
Tom told me that he wouldn\'t be able to be at the meeting.
Go straight until you see the post office, then turn right.
